text: Pierre-Yves Trémois (8 January 1921 – 16 August 2020) was a French visual artist and sculptor. He was known for working on drawing in equal proportions on surrealism and science illustration. He was born in Paris. He held seat #2 in the engraving section at the Académie des Beaux-Arts. In 2015, he was honored with the Commander of the Order of Arts and Letters."Nomination dans l'ordre des Arts et des Lettres juillet 2015" @ CultureCommunication. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French sculptors Category:Artists from Paris
title: Pierre-Yves Trémois
